column4: wow. nice channel. If anyone of the ubuntu developers are here, I would just like to say thanks for such an amazingly slick debian distro.
I've tried xadnros, libranet, mepis, debian, knoppix, bonzai and a whole host of others, but ubuntu is the first that beats debian hands down for ease and speed. well done!
everything was up an running perfectly in 10mins.
I really like it too. I used Arch Linux before.
